Rampage was relieved that Mutate was at least still functional, then
another emotion overcame his face. "Yes. I do know of where we can go
for help," he turned around. "But for the help I must make a deal with a
devil." he whispered the last part, and walked away a little bit from
Mutate. He opened a comm-link, "Co...commander Shockwave, this is unit
Rampage reporting." he said hesitantly.
